Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz602.jpg'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "...Don't stop! Watanabe!"}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ugh... this stench of blood...'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The floor... it's all..."}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "It's the recon team sent here by HQ before..."}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Their trails end here...'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'They all... died...'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Are you okay, Watanabe?'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I still can't... in an actual battlefield—I lied."}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "Don't mourn the dead with sorrow, Watanabe."}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Let them become your power to carry on.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Let's go back."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory55.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Regrouping team. Stationing here. Oasis team 2, split and prepare to head out.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Where are you bringing them, Bruce?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'The map shows a church in the snowfields up ahead north, there might be people left in there...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...The recon team's only gotten as far as this place. If we go any further—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What greets you will be a church full of mechanoid monsters, as for any citizens left... There will only be machines.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'No matter how hopeless, as long as I can save someone...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're just going on a suicide mission!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Watanabe, stay with the main team, and station here as well!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Bruce!!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'This is an order! I hold the right to command for team Oasis!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "I'll be back here in an hour...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "As a soldier, we must ensure the civilians' safety before our own and save as many lives as possible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "If there really are survivors in the church waiting for help... and we're here as well, then we cannot turn a blind eye.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "...It'll be fine, Watanabe.", 4: '1'}
